name: The Great Artists (itch)
description:
**THIS GAME IS DESIGNED TO BE ENJOYED FOR 15-20 MINUTES**

One art museum. Five phantom thieves. Twenty minutes of story.

Observe a 10-minute story about light-constructed snakes, incredibly rare fishes that can swim without water, many voguish rose-colored clothes, cards that obey no laws of modern physics and artistic light structures.

(Accompanied by five phantom thieves who accidentally bump into each other at an art museum, shenanigans ensue, mischeives emerge.)

Move the camera, stop time, jump between specific times and experience the story the way you wanted.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
